attributes.background: The Channel Tunnel is currently a magnet for illegal immigrants from around the world. Thousands have been camping out all summer disrupting travellers and trade. It should be closed and sealed until such time as it can be made permanently secure.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105337

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
